title: Unified Workflow/Rule Frontmatter Schema
description: A minimal schema for the frontmatter of .unified/**/*.md files.

title.description: The title of the workflow or rule.

description.description: A detailed description of the workflow or rule.

status.description: The status of the workflow or rule.

tags.description: A list of tags for the workflow or rule.

type.description: The type of the document (workflow or rule).

auto_execution_mode.description: The auto-execution mode for the workflow.

alwaysApply.description: Whether the rule should always be applied.

globs.description: A comma-separated list of glob patterns.

ide.description: IDE-agnostic configuration for handling hidden sections and metadata.

hidden_sections.description: A list of section headings to be hidden from the final rendered output.

metadata.description: A key-value store for additional metadata.
